| HistoryText             = The Wraith-Hunter Rangers are an elite branch of the [[United States Army (Earth-616)|U.S. Army]] led by [[Merriwether Locklin (Earth-616)|General Merriwether Locklin]]. This unit was created specifically to deal with the infiltration of [[Earth]] by the evil [[Dire Wraiths]]. Working in conjunction with [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] Esper agents and the [[Spaceknights (Galadorian) (Earth-616)|Spaceknights]] [[Rom (Earth-616)|Rom]] and [[Brandy Clark (Earth-616)|Starshine]] they strove to rid the Earth of the enemy.{{r|Rom #54|#66}}
